column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////For the dessert we got the chocolate chip cookie with ice cream
column2: which was delicious- probably tastes the same everywhere.  When it got crowded the waitress came back a little less
column4: but completely forgot our dessert order till 30 minutes later.  She did not even take it off the receipt
column5: but oh well.  I decided to order a fresh frozen pizza to take back to DC
column6: which worked out well and hopefully that tastes as good as the one in the store!  I would have given it 4.5 stars
column7: due to the service and I really liked another pizza place
column8: so it was not "As good as it gets
